Texts.Chs: 把^orange;增强铠甲^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Booster Croptop^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 这台机器可以制造很多种类的盔甲，请好好的利用它。
Texts.Eng: Non-metal based armors and gear will appear at this station, as well as standard tailoring goods.

Texts.Chs: 我是个愚蠢的裁缝，但我又偏偏喜欢追求时尚，所以你可以为我制作^orange;增强铠甲^reset;吗？
Texts.Eng: With a ^orange;I'd love some more fashionable clothing. Can you make me a ^orange;Booster Croptop^reset;? I am an abysmal seamstress.
